description:
The new Live Nation app brings you concerts, festivals, and tickets in one app, personalized just for you. You’ll never miss another show. You may never be bored again.

+ Scans your iTunes library - and understands what you really play - to help track your favorite artists
+ Pays attention to the artists you love and gives you alerts and updates. No more unwanted/just plain wrong alerts.
+ Easy, quick ticket purchasing in the app, plus mobile ticketing wherever we can do it
+ The most up-to-date concert and festival listings - thousands of shows each month
+ Show recommendations based on your tastes and your location, for tonight or next year
+ Exclusive access to early tickets and deals. Yes!
+ In-venue upgrades and specials
+ Exclusive content direct from artists
+ Connect with Facebook (totally optional) to help us better understand the music that you love
+ Find friends, share shows, make it happen!

Some highlights of the recent additions to the app:

+ iOS7 and iOS8 compatibility and optimized design
+ Easier to use and better looking!
+ New & improved favorites system (you'll keep the favorites you already have in this update)
+ New & improved recommendations and notifications
+ Optional Facebook account creation (we don’t post anything without your permission!) 
+ Improved location awareness and selection
+ New home screen experience with new ways to find shows, including tailored recommendations or search by distance from venue

This is just the beginning, and there's much more to come. Please let us know how we're doing! In the Account screen, tap on “Contact Us,” or email us at mobilefeedback@livenation.com.
trackCensoredName: Live Nation Concerts, Tickets and Everything Live Music
trackName: Live Nation Concerts, Tickets and Everything Live Music
releaseNotes:
Got a shiny new iPhone 6 or iPhone 6 Plus? This update is for you! We added support for both.
As always, we appreciate your feedback: mobilefeedback@livenation.com. We’re listening!
